title: Karenglish
description: Website and language learning program for the S'gaw Karen Language, still a work in progress, much more content to be added in the future.

title: Homebrew Computer
description: Simple CPU of my own architecture built from discrete logic chips on breadboards (PCBs coming soon?).

title: Any Length Wordle
